text: The Adventures of Robin Hood is a 1938 swashbuckler movie. It was directed by Michael Curtiz and William Keighley. It was shot in Technicolor. The movie stars Errol Flynn, Olivia de Havilland, Basil Rathbone, and Claude Rains. The story is based on the traditional tales of Robin Hood. It is the third of eight movies Flynn and De Havilland made together. The movie won three minor Academy Awards. In 1995, the movie was selected for preservation in the United States National Film Registry. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1938 movies Category:1930s adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:United States National Film Registry movies Category:Swashbuckler movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in England Category:Movies set in forests Category:Movies set in castles Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz Category:Movies directed by William Keighley Category:Robin Hood
title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
